name: Sakura Swim
description:
Hi, This is the submission from my game jam that took place in a GD course, We had a week to come up with a game under a theme (You cant control the player). Me and my team have been successful in creating a game we were all happy with, there is definitley more we would have liked to do with the game but timing limited our ability. I am not typically a coding person but I thought I would challenge myself on this Jam and be the main coder, I found it to be hard at times but with help from others I managed to wrap my head around the code and managed to produce a simple fun game. !! You may run into the 3 objects all at once giving you no escape, im very sorry, I tried to fix it but  I had no idea how !! Thanks for playing the game, leave any feedback so we can improve on the next jam.

My social: https://twitter.com/TobyKershawCGD
